meanings.definition: The quality or state of being inane.
meanings.sent1: The inanenesses of the joke made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't stand the inanenesses of the conversation.
meanings.sent3: The inanenesses of the situation was so ridiculous that it became funny.
meanings.sent4: The inanenesses of the task felt like a never-ending loop of boredom.
meanings.sent5: The inanenesses of the movie plot left the audience yawning.

meanings.definition: The lack of significance or meaning.
meanings.sent1: The inanenesses of the decision left everyone puzzled.
meanings.sent2: He was tired of the inanenesses of small talk.
meanings.sent3: The inanenesses of the assignment made it hard to take seriously.
meanings.sent4: The inanenesses of the empty room echoed with loneliness.
meanings.sent5: The inanenesses of the painting made it forgettable.
